title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 364.2 - Availability of buildings and grounds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 364.2 - Availability of buildings and grounds

State Regulations
(a) The availability for use of any
buildings, grounds or portions thereof, shall be determined by the commissioner
in his sole discretion. (b) Buildings and grounds may be available for use subject to all terms and
conditions contained in the department's standard use agreement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
364.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
